audiobook.description:
Author(s): Jeff Kinney Narrator(s): Ramón de Ocampo

Jeff Kinney's Wimpy Kid series is a publishing phenomenon, having reached number-one on the New York Times best-seller list. This fourth hilarious installment finds Greg Heffley approaching summer vacation with a clear plan: Stay inside and play as many video games as possible. Unfortunately for Greg, his mother has a much different idea about how the summer will transpire - she envisions lots of outdoor activities and "family togetherness".
audiobook.html_description:
Author(s): Jeff Kinney
Narrator(s): Ramón de Ocampo
<p>Jeff Kinney's Wimpy Kid series is a publishing phenomenon, having reached number-one on the <i>New York Times</i> best-seller list. This fourth hilarious installment finds Greg Heffley approaching summer vacation with a clear plan: Stay inside and play as many video games as possible. Unfortunately for Greg, his mother has a much different idea about how the summer will transpire - she envisions lots of outdoor activities and "family togetherness".</p>
audiobook.name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
